titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Pittsburgh Regional Library Center Records, 1967-1985 AIS.1990.12
titlestmt.author: Archive Service Center staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:22:35 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: This collection contains records of the Pittsburgh Regional Library Center, including minutes of the board of trustees, the executive council, and several committees, budgets, directories, state contracts, grants, activities files, and booklets.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Pittsburgh Regional Library Center (PRLC) was incorporated in 1967 for the purpose of facilitating resource sharing among academic, public, and school libraries. According to PRLC's by-laws, the center was "formed for the charitable, scientific, literary and educational purposes of advancing library science, for the promotion of library services, and for the promotion of inter-library cooperation among the public and private libraries in the City of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and surrounding areas to a distance of 200 miles."

Initial funding for the Center was provided by the A. W. Mellon Educational and Charitable Trust. A local clearinghouse was established in the early 1970s with funds from the Hillman Foundation. The PRLC was governed by a fifteen-member Board of Trustees. Twelve members of the board were elected from the membership and the other three came from the community-at-large. The Executive Director served ex-officio.

On November 30, 1995 the PRLC officially merged with Palinet assuming all assets and liabilities. The Palinet headquarters remained in Philadelphia, and eventually merged with SOLINET and NELINET to form LYRASIS in 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records of the Pittsburgh Regional Library Center, including minutes of the board of trustees, the executive council, and several committees, budgets, directories, state contracts, grants, activities files, and booklets.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited by Pittsburgh Regional Library Center in 1990.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Pittsburgh Regional Library Center Records, 1967-1985, AIS.1990.12, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pittsburgh Regional Library Center Records, 1967-1985, AIS.1990.12, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Archives Service Center Staff in 1990. Revision and rearrangement for the encoded version of the finding aid provided by Jennifer Marshall in February 1999, and by Martha L. Berg in May 2000. Information about the collection title and the controlled access terms was extracted from the MARC record in the University of Pittsburgh catalog, Notis ID number: AKG4625.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.
